tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Even though there was a connection problem at the beginning of the call on our end, the doctor was very courteous and cooperative. He carefully listened to our problems and addressed them appropriately. My baby also responded well to the medications he provided.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Modi is a very polite and cheerful doctor. The moment you step in his clinic you hav this positive vibe around. My kid (even though he is months baby) love it when we enter his clinic, it's so colourful and vibrant.and as a doctor, Dr. Modi has this special way of handling your kid softly and politely, which is extremely reassuring that your child is in safe hands. His dedication towards your child will speak through his involvement with you and your child. There have been situations, where looking at my child's reports, he has called me at 11pm and guided me on what needs to be done to improve my kid's health. This is a rare quality you will see in any doctor out there.I would definitely recommend Dr. Amit Modi :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had been going to Dr. Amit Modi for my child's vaccinations and other treatment. He is very friendly and good doctor who first listens to your problems and then tries to treat well through medicines that are light on the body of small kids but very effective. My son Tanmay also had all his vaccination done from him. I used to go to his clinic in Vasundhara Plaza in East Delhi but since I have shifted to Greater Noida consult him through Practo. He is one doctor who is always available for you even in this pandemic situation and even on phone. So I recommend Dr. Amit Modi to all who want their children to get right and effective treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Amit Modi has great expertise in pediatrics,I can speak with my own experience,he has been very helpful n generous,I really appreciate the dedication that he is happy to help ,so I strongly recommend him.
It was really very excellent experience as I visited with my son to his clinic .he is does not advice unnecessary test and medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Amit is one of most humble doctor I've encountered till now. I consulted him for my 7 weeks old baby. He carefully listened to the problems I reported and took his time to explain the causes in details. *** ********* ** *********** *** ********* ****** ******Definitely recommend the Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He was extremely good with his explanation. And was very friendly with my 1 month baby. We are very proud to meet such nice doctor. He knew what he was doing and explained us what to do in odd situation and how should we take care if our newly borned baby. Overall it was a very satisfactory visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Childhood Infections,Growth & Development Evaluation / Management,All Pediatric Problems ,
review: *** **** **** ** * **** **** ******* he is helpful by nature & a good human being. It is rare to find this type doctor in today's world. His treatment technique is good and handles children in very good manner. He always focuses on treatment with minimum use of medicine. He tells very clearly and never hides any serious problem, it makes him different from other doctors.. Doctor as well as employee is also very friendly at his centre. He gives adequate time to discuss all issues with parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been visiting Dr Modi for day to day illness of my baby as well as his vaccination, since he was a newborn. I am totally satisfied with his treatment. He answers all your queries patiently with smile and gives proper time. I would also like to appreciate his handling of babies with utmost care.
Thank You Dr Modi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Childhood Infections,Growth & Development Evaluation / Management,Children's Health,Adolescent Followup & Vaccinations,
review:
Doctor was kind enough to wait for me as we were leaving for vacation and my daughters vaccination was due. 
I am regular to him and he has become a friend 
I have been a fan of him since his lady Harding days. 
My daughter had some serious infection. I had already consulted many doctors but there was no relief. Then a friend of mine suggested of Dr. Amit. And thanks to him my daughter became healthier and since then I have been a fan of him
reply_text: Thanks a ton for such a lengthy review.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Did the video consultation with doctor for my son. He prescribed some medicine. *** ********* ** ** *** ************ ****** ** **** ** ****** *** ********* He started vomiting very badly and was coughing very seriously. He vomitted 5-6 times within an hour and was not able to keep even a single drop of water in his stomach. I informed the doctor about it and requested to suggest something to help but he didn't even reply. 
Seeing the serious condition, I had to take my son to hospital ***** **** ********* **** ***** *** *** ********* **********Height of the unprofessionalism is that the doctor replied late night of next day........
Non-responsiveness of a doctor towards the patient's serious condition is the least expected thing we can expect from a doctor.
I would never recommend this doctor.
reply_text:
Online Consultation has limitations, one should understand this before going for an online consultation. An emergency or serious condition can never be handled over online consultation. 
Online consultation is only for the primary management, if not improving you have to rush to your doctor or hospital physically. As medicines prescribed over online consultation is based on symptoms of the patient described by the attendant without examining the patient. 
Follow up consultation for an online consultation over practo is generally answered as per schedule of the doctor and may some time take 24 hour. 
Writing a review is fine, but abusing someone's profession and credibility is not acceptable. 
All the medicine adviced for your son was in good faith, as per the symptoms described by you.

reply_text: Thanks for your positive feedback, these are really encouraging for us.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ***** ** ** ****** ***** * **** ** ******** ************He didn't take the things seriously...I will not recommend
reply_text: With due respect, I would like to remind you that I had asked you to follow up in 2 to 3 days. You never turned up for a follow up. This is necessary, as I had to see the affect of first line antibiotics given for acute tonsillitis. As per the protocol, we upgrade the antibiotics in 2 days if the treatment is not responding. Starting a higher line of antibiotics in first visit is not recommended, as they may cause resistance and they do have some side effect.
